item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m from Taiwan. I’m nineteen years old and with great interest in game development and programming because Taiwan height school is not for me, so I chose to Self-study this meed I need to give up all of the resources from normal education, but instead, I can choice what to learn and how to learn freely. I start by watching video on Udemy, step by step learning how to build a game and make some sample projects
